ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Jean-Pierre Chrétien ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. JEAN-PIERRE CHRÉTIEN, a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court of Justice for the District of Montréal, in and for the Province of Quebec, effective January 1, 2016.
AttachmentsAttachment
